memberdef.name: __RTREE_TEMPLATE_DEFN
memberdef.initializer: template < \ typename _bound_type, \ typename _leaf_type, \ std::size_t _dimensions, \ std::size_t _min_child_items, \ std::size_t _max_child_items, \ template < \ typename _b_nb, \ template <typename _bn_i, std::size_t _bn_mi> class _NodeType, \ template <typename _bni_k, typename _bni_i> class _NodeItemType, \ typename _b_l, \ typename _b_k, \ std::size_t _b_mi> \ class _Backend \ >
